description: Check out all the significant signings and departures in August 2023.
title: Transfer news: Done deals in August 2023 - Neymar, Moises Caicedo, Harry Kane
title_page: Transfer news: Done deals in August 2023 - Neymar, Moises Caicedo, Harry Kane - BBC Sport
maintext:
The summer transfer window for clubs in England and Scotland continues after opening in June.
For a full list of transfers made in July visit this page, for all the latest rumours check out today's gossip column, or take a look at our collation of club released and retained lists.
